name: Sneha R.
message: Patan Durbar Square has such intricate details on every temple. Loved the peaceful atmosphere!

name: Rohan S.
message: The view from Swayambhunath was absolutely stunning! A perfect blend of spirituality and beauty.

name: Priya T.
message: Pashupatinath Temple was crowded but still a powerful experience. Worth visiting early morning.
